subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] RE: mike, about asking questions
author: Wiliam Clarke
full_text:
--0-1938636196-1208549279=:42507
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=iso-8859-1
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 8bit

Please don't give up.  I am still learning, and I need a teacher.  Even though we don't know each other.  I try to learn something everday from you, so I will be able to make my own box one day.   Even if is a frankinized 12-469, or made from a car stereo.  I with ya all the way, even though some stuff I know nothing about, and thats why I learn, to get educated on the subject.  I have already studying basic electronics.
   
  William

Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@...> wrote:
           I give up! Don't listen to someone that has done this stuff longer than anyone. Just get all your information from TAPS, and Paranormal State, ---- Hollywood! All friggin' glamor and greed and attention seekers, nothing else! And that seems to be all that is sought after on these groups. I don't have time for this, and this not what I made the boxes for! 
 
 Whatever you do don't let spirit speak, try to second guess everything, always assume y'all are so much more advanced. 
 
 
 Frank-S
